title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 200.10 - Serving of notices by Cemetery Board or division
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 200.10 - Serving of notices by Cemetery Board or division

State Regulations

Unless otherwise specified by statute, all notices or other
papers shall be served by the State Cemetery Board or the division upon a
cemetery corporation in person or by mail. When any party is represented by an
attorney, service upon such attorney shall be deemed service upon the
party. Notes

200.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
